qas.question: What is the primamry reason for testing software?
What can testing software not fully completely establish?

answers.text: cannot establish that a product functions properly under all conditions

qas.question: What does the scope of testing the software also look at?

answers.text: examination of code as well as execution of that code

qas.question: Which two teams would you normally separate when writing and testing software?

answers.text: testing organization may be separate from the development team

plausible_answers.text: to detect software failures so that defects may be discovered and corrected.

qas.question: What is a secondary purpose of testing software?

plausible_answers.text: examination of code as well as execution of that code in various environments and conditions as well as examining the aspects of code

qas.question: What does software testing always include?

plausible_answers.text: a testing organization may be separate from the development team

qas.question: In the previous culture of software development, what two things were separate?

plausible_answers.text: the process by which software is developed.

qas.question: Data from software testing may be used to model what?

context: A primary purpose of testing is <a0_0><b4_0>to detect software failures<a0_0/> so that defects may be discovered and corrected.<b4_0/> Testing <a1_0>cannot establish that a product functions properly under all conditions<a1_0/> but can only establish that it does not function properly under specific conditions. The scope of software testing often includes <a2_0><b5_0>examination of code as well as execution of that code<a2_0/> in various environments and conditions as well as examining the aspects of code<b5_0/>: does it do what it is supposed to do and do what it needs to do. In the current culture of software development, <b6_0>a <a3_0>testing organization may be separate from the development team<b6_0/><a3_0/>. There are various roles for testing team members. Information derived from software testing may be used to correct <b7_0>the process by which software is developed.
